alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 25 at 1:32PM MDT until August 27 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTS WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITIES POSSIBLE ACROSS IDAHO ZONES 423 AND 426... .A closed low and associated cold front will bring gusty winds on Saturday. Breezy southwesterly winds ahead of the front Saturday morning will shift to the northwest behind the front Saturday afternoon. This combined with low humidities could result in favorable wildfires conditions. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * WINDS...15-25 MPH with gusts up to 35 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Around 10 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
